00020 #include "uvm_commandline.h"
00021 
00022 namespace uvm {
00023 
00024 const std::string FILE_FLAG = "-F";
00025 
00026 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 // Constructor: uvm_commandline
00028 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 uvm_commandline::uvm_commandline()
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Destructor: uvm_commandline
00035 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 uvm_commandline::~uvm_commandline()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // Function: execute()
00042 //   Process the commandline arguments
00043 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 void uvm_commandline::execute(int argc, char **argv)
00045 {
00046   std::string str;
00047   std::string file_name;
00048   std::string file_ext;
00049   size_t pos;
00050   uvm_commandline_plugin *p_plugin = NULL;
00051 
00052   // First argument is always the executable
00053   // If less than 2 arg, then no commandline
00054   if (argc < 2) return;
00055 
00056   // Loop through commandline arguments
00057   for (int i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00058   {
00059     str = argv[i];
00060     if (str == FILE_FLAG)
00061     {
00062       file_name = argv[i+1];
00063       pos = file_name.find(".");
00064       file_ext = file_name.substr(pos + 1);
00065       p_plugin = _plugin_map[file_ext];
00066 
00067       if (p_plugin != NULL)
00068         p_plugin->execute(file_name);
00069     }
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 } // namespace
